member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE
member.summary: Modifies how the final inertia end position is calculated.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_MANDATORY
member.summary: Content always stops at the snap point closest to where inertia would naturally stop along the direction of inertia.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_OPTIONAL
member.summary: Content stops at a snap point closest to where inertia would naturally stop along the direction of inertia, depending on how close the snap point is.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_MANDATORY_SINGLE
member.summary: Content always stops at the snap point closest to the release point along the direction of inertia.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_SNAPPOINT_OPTIONAL_SINGLE
member.summary: Content stops at the next snap point, if the motion starts far from it.
